label:
This is a notification that is dispayed as in-app if a user liked a comment. Notification is sent to creator of item that is liked
You can insert the following dynamic values:

##WhoLike## who liked posting
##RecipientName## The Reciver of notification
##DateToDay## The date event is sent
##Time## The time event is sent

template.subject: Default template subject
template.body: Default template content, yeah. Have an awesome day!
